content: Is your authentication method set to oauth2.0. Yahoo uses tokens under oath to authenticate, not passwords unless you are using a web browser.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Additional info: I also get a prompt which says: "Login to server <servername> failed "Retry" "Enter New Password" "Cancel"

However the system will not allow me to select the "Enter New Password" option.
creator: famoore

content: did you delete the outgoing server (SMTP) entry for your old address in account settings? I am guessing not.
creator: MattAuSupport
